Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

description: SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces The Ultimate Creative Builder for Little Engineers! Get ready for an explosion of fun and learning with the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set, designed to ignite the imaginations of your little ones aged one and up! Inside this generous set, you'll find a treasure trove of 100 vibrant, engaging pieces that are perfectly sized for tiny hands. Imagine the incredible creations you can build with 48 short bars, 8 wonderfully curved bars that add dynamic flow to your designs, and 18 long bars for grander structures. To bring your visions to life, there are 26 sturdy magnetic balls that connect everything with satisfying clicks, making building a breeze and wonderfully safe. But the fun doesn't stop there! This set comes with a super-sturdy storage container that’s more than just a place to keep your pieces tidy. Oh no, this container is a building surface in itself! Both the lid and the bottom are cleverly designed with unique building grids, providing a fantastic foundation and a clear starting point for constructing your first marvelous creations or adding extra levels to your existing masterpieces. The included colorful building guides are packed with inspiring ideas and a range of amazing models to get you started, helping young builders learn as they play and experiment with different shapes and connections. This hands-on experience promotes essential developmental skills like problem-solving, spatial reasoning, and fine motor control, all while keeping the mood light and joyful. The magnetic connections are a marvel, allowing for effortless assembly and disassembly, so your little architect can rebuild and redesign their dreams as often as they like. Whether you're looking for an engaging activity for a rainy day, a stimulating educational tool for the playroom, or a wonderful gift that keeps on giving, the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set is an absolute winner. It’s designed to grow with your child, offering new challenges and creative opportunities as they get older and their building ambitions expand. Dive into a world of colorful construction, where every magnetic connection brings you closer to a finished marvel, and every playtime session is an adventure in learning and family fun. This set encourages collaborative play, allowing siblings or parents and children to work together, share ideas, and celebrate their collective achievements. The bright colors and satisfying tactile experience of the pieces make it an irresistible invitation to explore and build. It’s more than just a toy; it’s a tool for fostering creativity, encouraging critical thinking, and creating precious family memories, one magnetic build at a time.

description: Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. description: Buy Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots. FREE UK Delivery Orders over £50. NEXT Day Delivery Available from BRIGHTMINDS. Leading UK Online toys, games, gifts & books for children which inspire & entertain!

Kinoptic Moving Art Robots Create Awesome Optical Illusion Art! Get ready for an explosion of creativity with the Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots, where art meets optical magic for hours of family fun! This isn't just a toy; it's an invitation to explore the fascinating world of illusion and imagination. Inside this fantastic kit, you'll discover everything you need to design your very own robot characters. The included chequered board serves as your canvas, providing a perfect grid to sketch out your robot's form. Think about cool robotic limbs, whirring gears, or even quirky antennae – the possibilities are as limitless as your child's imagination! Once your robot masterpiece is complete, it's time for the truly exciting part: bringing it to life! Simply take the special striped sheet, which acts like a magic wand, and hold it over your creation. As you move the sheet, a remarkable optical illusion will unfold before your eyes, making your static drawing appear to move and dance! It’s a captivating effect that sparks wonder and encourages curiosity about how we perceive movement. This hands-on activity is perfect for children aged 6 to 10, nurturing their artistic skills while simultaneously introducing them to basic principles of optics and visual perception. The educational aspect is subtle but powerful, as children naturally learn about animation and visual effects through play. The Djeco Kinoptic Moving Art Robots are designed to be engaging and easy to use, ensuring that even the youngest budding artists can achieve stunning results and experience the thrill of making their art animate. Imagine the gasps of delight and excited chatter as your children reveal their moving robot friends to the whole family! This kit fosters a love for art and science, making learning an enjoyable adventure. It’s a wonderful way for kids to express themselves and develop fine motor skills as they draw and manipulate the art pieces. Get ready for a gallery of moving marvels created right in your own home!

description: SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces The Ultimate Creative Builder for Little Engineers! Get ready for an explosion of fun and learning with the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set, designed to ignite the imaginations of your little ones aged one and up! This isn't just any building toy; it's a gateway to endless discovery and a fantastic way for the whole family to bond through play. Inside this generous set, you'll find a treasure trove of 100 vibrant, engaging pieces that are perfectly sized for tiny hands. Imagine the incredible creations you can build with 48 short bars, 8 wonderfully curved bars that add dynamic flow to your designs, and 18 long bars for grander structures. To bring your visions to life, there are 26 sturdy magnetic balls that connect everything with satisfying clicks, making building a breeze and wonderfully safe. But the fun doesn't stop there! This set comes with a super-sturdy storage container that’s more than just a place to keep your pieces tidy. Oh no, this container is a building surface in itself! Both the lid and the bottom are cleverly designed with unique building grids, providing a fantastic foundation and a clear starting point for constructing your first marvelous creations or adding extra levels to your existing masterpieces. The included colorful building guides are packed with inspiring ideas and a range of amazing models to get you started, helping young builders learn as they play and experiment with different shapes and connections. These lights are an excellent way to encourage children to enjoy bath time, making it a playful and happy occasion. It's a fantastic gadget that brings together entertainment and relaxation in a uniquely fun way.

description: Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. description: SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces The Ultimate Creative Builder for Little Engineers! Get ready for an explosion of fun and learning with the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set, designed to ignite the imaginations of your little ones aged one and up! This isn't just any building toy; it's a gateway to endless discovery and a fantastic way for the whole family to bond through play. Inside this generous set, you'll find a treasure trove of 100 vibrant, engaging pieces that are perfectly sized for tiny hands. Imagine the incredible creations you can build with 48 short bars, 8 wonderfully curved bars that add dynamic flow to your designs, and 18 long bars for grander structures. To bring your visions to life, there are 26 sturdy magnetic balls that connect everything with satisfying clicks, making building a breeze and wonderfully safe. But the fun doesn't stop there! This set comes with a super-sturdy storage container that’s more than just a place to keep your pieces tidy. Oh no, this container is a building surface in itself! Both the lid and the bottom are cleverly designed with unique building grids, providing a fantastic foundation and a clear starting point for constructing your first marvelous creations or adding extra levels to your existing masterpieces. The included colorful building guides are packed with inspiring ideas and a range of amazing models to get you started, helping young builders learn as they play and experiment with different shapes and connections. This hands-on experience promotes essential developmental skills like problem-solving, spatial reasoning, and fine motor control, all while keeping the mood light and joyful. The magnetic connections are a marvel, allowing for effortless assembly and disassembly, so your little architect can rebuild and redesign their dreams as often as they like. Whether you're looking for an engaging activity for a rainy day, a stimulating educational tool for the playroom, or a wonderful gift that keeps on giving, the SmartMax Build & Learn 100 Pieces set is an absolute winner. It’s designed to grow with your child, offering new challenges and creative opportunities as they get older and their building ambitions expand. Dive into a world of colorful construction, where every magnetic connection brings you closer to a finished marvel, and every playtime session is an adventure in learning and family fun. This set encourages collaborative play, allowing siblings or parents and children to work together, share ideas, and celebrate their collective achievements. The bright colors and satisfying tactile experience of the pieces make it an irresistible invitation to explore and build. It’s more than just a toy; it’s a tool for fostering creativity, encouraging critical thinking, and creating precious family memories, one magnetic build at a time.

The Ultimate SmartMax set for the classroom or the bedroom! SmartMax Build & Learn features 100 building pieces and a container that is a sturdy storage unit - and much more! Both the lid and the bottom of the container each offer unique building grids to help you on your way to building original and colourful structures. Colourful building guides are also included. Age: 1+ Inside the box Contains 100 pieces:- 48 short bars 8 curved bars 18 long bars 26 magnetic balls and 2 colourful instruction guides with a range of models.

In fact, you might find yourself playing bath time music and having a full-blown dance party! And it's not just for the kids; adults will love this too. After a long day of supervising kiddie bath time, why not unwind yourself? You can sink into a luxurious bath bathed in pulsating light, either for a deeply meditative experience or to let loose and have your own personal party after everyone else is tucked in. These lights are designed to be compact and easy to use, measuring 8.5 x 8.5 x 8cm each. They require three AAA batteries per light to bring them to life, so make sure you have plenty on hand for endless hours of illuminated enjoyment. While they are not a toy, they are suitable for children aged five and up, with parents providing supervision to switch them on and off, ensuring a safe and magical experience for everyone. The vibrant LED sequences and flashing effects create a truly immersive and captivating environment that is both visually stimulating and wonderfully entertaining. They're perfect for creating a fun atmosphere for sleepovers, birthday parties, or just to add a touch of magic to your everyday routine. Embrace the glow and let these Disco Bath Lights bring joy and sparkle to your home, making bath time the most anticipated part of the day for the whole family. This set truly enhances the bathing experience, making it an exciting and enjoyable activity for all ages. The underwater light show capability is particularly noteworthy, turning a simple bath into a captivating visual performance. The ability to select from five distinct display sequences means you can tailor the ambiance precisely to your desires, whether it’s a serene, gently glowing escape or a lively, pulsating party. These lights are an excellent way to encourage children to enjoy bath time, making it a playful and happy occasion. The design is intuitive and the effects are brilliant, offering a delightful sensory experience that will be remembered long after the water has drained. It's a fantastic gadget that brings together entertainment and relaxation in a uniquely fun way.

description: Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. description: Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. description: Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits. description: Grab your tools, it’s time to get building! Learn how to use tools and build your own workbench with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages three and up. Join Ty and Karlie — the young engineers featured in the other Kids First early engineering kits — to learn how to use a hammer, screwdriver, and wrench, and the basic engineering principles behind how these tools work. This kit features large tools that are comfortable for kids to hold, while also being lightweight and safe. In addition to the workbench, build five other awesome models with the included modular building parts, including a race car, airplane, house, scissors, and a toolbox to carry your tools. Then let your imagination run wild and build your own creations! Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building helps develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. The parts in this kit are compatible with the parts of other Thames & Kosmos Kids First engineering kits.
